settings.content: Popcorn Shed are rewriting the rules of snacks, in the UK and beyond! Say goodbye to boring, tasteless popcorn. Popcorn Shed is the UK's first super-premium gourmet popcorn brand.

settings.title: The Factory
settings.text:
Where the magic happens!

Our production process is complex.  Whilst our competitors apply spray-on and powder coatings in an industrial process, Popcorn Shed uses an artisan cooking process by making a fresh caramel batch with each production run.  Our popcorn is tumbled in fresh caramel before being scattered with melted chocolate, nuts and dried fruit.  This ensures a deep, rich flavour and provides a lovely texture to every single kernel.

settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.text:
Let's Pop to it! 

We’re Sam and Laura, cousins and founders of Popcorn Shed.  
We have always appreciated the humble popcorn snack and it’s power to enhance special moments spent with friends, family and loved ones.  

With that in mind, we dedicated ourselves to perfecting popcorn treats associated with joy and happiness by prioritising flavour and quality, hoping that it will bring our fans as many great memories as it has brought to us.

Operating out of our garden shed since 2016, Popcorn Shed is a home-grown, family-owned business - a made in Britain artisanal brand.

settings.title: OUR MISSION
settings.text:
To be the number one gourmet popcorn brand choice in the world. To be Innovation leaders. To make great tasting popcorn. To create unique flavours. To provide top quality service.

Popcorn Shed founders Sam and Laura are passionate about great tasting products, and building a lifestyle brand from scratch that has real meaning and resonates with consumers.  We believe that our popcorn brings people together, enhancing those special moments we spend with friends, family and loved ones.  By sharing and consuming our popcorn treats, our customers' lives are made that little bit happier and more joyful!  Popcorn Shed exists to build relationships, and put smiles on our customer's faces.

settings.title: Our Products
settings.content: Our popcorn is made with carefully sourced, high-quality ingredients. We focus on innovation, flavour balance and texture combinations. Whether it's nuts, chocolate, or fruit, our tasty treats are so much more than just popcorn.

settings.title: Contact Us
settings.contact_address: Popcorn Shed, 30 City Road, London, EC1Y 2AB

settings.subtitle:
When you refer a friend, they get $10 off their order and you earn $10. 
Everybody wins!

settings.contact_heading: iDecoz Custom Microfiber Screen Cleaner Stickers
settings.contact_subheading: ARE THE BEST PORTABLE & CONVENIENT SOLUTION FOR DIRTY SCREENS
settings.contact_content:
iDecoz custom screen cleaners are must-have promotional items, gifts and party favors. We can duplicate any image and match any color. Turnaround time is approximately 4 days from final artwork approval. They're available in various sizes, custom shapes and custom packaging. All iDecoz custom screen cleaners are restickable and can be used again and again without leaving a residue.

For more information please call us at 1.888.645.1460. Email us at CustomerService@iDecoz.com or submit the form.

settings.title: Bespoke & Corporate Gifts
settings.subtitle:
Leave a lasting memory with our range of all natural,
vegetarian, gluten free and incredibly delicious products.

settings.title: Popcorn is the Perfect Corporate Gift
settings.content: If you're after a special gift for your clients, a memorable thank you for your colleagues, a bespoke keepsake for your wedding guests or something creative to launch a new product, we're here to help.

settings.title: Our Corporate Gifting Solutions
settings.gift_desc1: Discover handcrafted gourmet popcorn gifts for every occasion. Customise with your corporate logo or bespoke design.
settings.gift_desc2: If you’re after something special to reward your colleagues, a good bag filler for an event or a gift for your wedding guests.
settings.gift_desc3: Whether you're shouting about a new product, arranging a marketing campaign or simply showing you care, we will work to bring your idea to life.
settings.gift_desc4: A creative way to say thank you for your clients. The perfect way to show you care with thoughtful, personalised presents with that 'wow factor'.
settings.gift_desc5: It's never too early to think about Christmas! It's a time for gifting, sharing and showing we care. We're here to make your Christmas gifting that little bit more special, personal and impactful.
settings.gift_desc6: If you’re after something special to serve your guest on the big day, make it unique and personal with personalised popcorn.

settings.title: How it works
settings.description1: With a wide range of delicious flavours on offer – and unique packaging options to suit each individual client – we believe that we can cater for just about anyone. Whatever the occasion, our creative team are here to help with the process. We can come up with something to suit any budget or event whilst making sure your name and branding take centre stage.
settings.description2: We work closely with each corporate client to make sure we create a personalised product that’s beautifully fit for purpose, whether that’s a profile-raising event, direct marketing campaign, delicious customer gift or memorable staff incentive.
settings.tab3: Place order by phone or email
settings.description3: Work with our team and place your order by phone or email. Smooth and easy process.
settings.description4: Work with our team to get your sweet delivery in time for your special event

settings.title: Our Flavours
settings.text: We have over 10 delicious flavours to choose from. And there is one to suit every palate! We also offer bespoke flavour development options if you’re looking for something a little bit different.

settings.title: View our catalogue
settings.subtitle: Please browse our promotional popcorn range or contact our team to discuss your corporate popcorn requirements!

settings.title: The Ultimate Popcorn Subscription Gift
settings.description_1: Why not treat your popcorn-loving loved ones to this tantalizing subscription box? That's a shed load of popcorn!
settings.description_2: Our incredible subscription packs are sent out by post and allow the lucky recipient to be the first to try exclusive new product and flavour launches from Popcorn Shed.
settings.description_3: Popcorn Shed is a Great Taste Award winner and was a finalist in the World Food Innovation Awards for Best Packaging Design.
settings.description_4: Made with all-natural ingredients and handcrafted in England. All of our popcorn is certified gluten-free and vegetarian.

settings.title: Your Subscription Box
settings.subscription_desc1: In your first box you will receive a subscription certificate, along with the box contents (1 gift jar, one shed box, one snack pack and one Mini Pop!)
settings.subscription_desc2: These will arrive with a surprise popcorn selection (1 gift jar, one shed box, one snack pack and one Mini Pop!)
settings.subscription_desc3: Lots of delicious popcorn flavours to try. You lucky thing you!

settings.title: How It Works
settings.subscription_desc1:
Choose whether you would like your popcorn subscription to last 3 months, 6 months or 12 months.

At the start of the subscription, the recipient will receive their first delivery of popcorn, along with a subscription certificate!
settings.subscription_title2: You receive a shed load of popcorn
settings.subscription_desc2: Each delivery contains a number of different and exciting Popcorn Shed flavours in 1 x gift jar, 1 x shed box, 1 snack pack and one Mini Pop! pack.  We pick the flavours for you!
settings.subscription_title3: We deliver straight to your door
settings.subscription_desc3: The recipient will receive further popcorn deliveries each subsequent month, until the subscription ends! Lucky them!

settings.subtitle1:
You can purchase a Gift Subscription for either a recurring order (every month), a one-off order, or you can pre-pay for 3, 6 or 12 months. After selecting the box type,  follow the steps to checkout. 

Once you have purchased a subscription to the Tasting Club, you will receive an order notification e-mail, which you can email directly to the recipient to let them know about their gift.
settings.title2: What do I get for the subscription?
settings.subtitle2:
We offer a SURPRISE selection of flavours with each box.
Each box will contain:
1 x Gourmet Popcorn Gift Jar (135g - 225g) , 1 x Gourmet Popcorn Shed (55g - 90g), 1 x Gourmet popcorn Snack Pack (16- 26g), 1 x Mini Pop! mini popcorn pack (20- 28g). Please note: varying weight is depending on flavour.
settings.subtitle3: The cost of delivery is included in the price of all subscription orders.
settings.subtitle4:
Yes! If you choose 'Subscribe & Save', you save 6% every month for the duration of your subscription.

If pre-pay, you save 6% on your purchase by selecting 3 months at checkout.  You save 12% on your purchase by selecting 6 months at checkout.  You save 18% on your purchase by selecting 12 months at checkout.s
settings.subtitle5: You will receive a surprise selection of delicious flavours to try. Here are some of our flavours: Salted Caramel, Pecan Pie, Berry-licious, Say Cheese!, Pop N Choc, Cherry Bakewell, Sweet Cheesus, Butterly Nuts, Goat's Cheese, Salt & Vinegar, Toffee, Sea Salt, White Truffle. Sweet & Salty and more!

settings.title: What is Mini Pop!?
settings.text:
Popcorn Shed’s Mini Pop!® kernels have a significantly thinner hull than most other popcorn brands. This means that nearly all of the hull disintegrates when chewed. Virtually no hulls get stuck in your teeth and the popcorn is much easier to digest.
A cleaner eating experience. And it’s mini!

Japanese hulless popcorn is an older variety of corn grown with pure heirloom, non-hybrid popcorn seeds.  The crop produces smaller kernels, about half the size of regular popcorn, known for their distinctive nutty flavour and crunchy texture.

The kernels are smaller than typical corn kernels. Due to their tiny size and fragile nature, these “micro” kernels found in Mini Pop!® rapidly break down during the cooking process, and virtually disintegrate when chewed, improving the eating experience.  Customers have commented that the hulls do not get stuck in their teeth and it is easier to digest, being kinder on tummies.

settings.title: The Science
settings.text: Popcorn Shed’s Mini Pop!® kernels have a significantly thinner hull than standard popcorn brands. This means nearly all of the hull disintegrates when chewed. Therefore, virtually no hulls get stuck in your teeth and the popcorn is easier to digest.
settings.inner_text: This inner layer is made of soluble fibre. It remains stuck to the popped kernel. It is an excellent source of fibre and won't get stuck in your teeth or cause digestive problems.
settings.outer_text: This outer layer is made of a non-soluble fibre. It typically hangs off the popped kernel, gets stuck in your teeth and causes digestive problems.  Our Mini Pop® kernels have a very thin hull, eliminating these problems.

settings.title: Flavours
settings.text: Available in five delicious, low calorie flavours.
settings.pro_title1:
Salt and Vinegar
(Case of 24 x 22g)
settings.pro_desc1: A British classic flavour. Zingy, light and wonderfully tasty.
settings.pro_desc2: Seasoned with a sprinkle of the perfect amount of Sea Salt.
settings.pro_desc3: The perfect balance of Sweet and Salty.
settings.pro_desc4: The first vegan Toffee Popcorn in the UK. Deliciously sweet with a butterscotch taste.
settings.pro_desc5: Luxury and fragrant lightly salted gourmet Truffle popcorn. A unique flavour for all the senses.
settings.pro_desc6: A variety of all the flavours, 2 packs each!

settings.title: The Perfect Gift for your POP!
settings.subtitle: Father's Day is coming up and we think it's time to treat our dads to a thoughtful gift to show how much we love them! Delight your dad with a perfect popcorn gift, savoury or sweet. We've just launched our Father's Day collection with the tastiest products, check them out now!

settings.title: Introducing: Mini Pop! Maple Bacon
settings.subtitle:
You thought 'vegan' and 'bacon' don't go together? Think again!

We're POPping with excitement to be adding a new flavour to our vegan Mini Pop! range: Maple Bacon Flavour! The perfect balance of smoky bacon flavour with the sweet taste of maple syrup. Are you ready to meet your new addiction?

settings.title: Build your own bundle!
settings.subtitle:
You asked, we delivered! You can now build your very own bundle with your favourite flavours. Perfect for when you want to restock your snack drawer with your faves, or as a custom gift for a dear friend.

Start building your bundle today!

settings.title: Poppin' Picnic Snacks
settings.subtitle: With lockdown restrictions easing and the weather getting better, we think it's time for a (socially distanced) picnic! Whether you pick one of our 20+ popcorn flavours or try a tasting pack with your friends or family, picnic success guaranteed!

settings.title: Jingle Bell Pop!
settings.testimonial: It looks amazing. I bought it as a present for my daughter and son-in-law, along with some of your boxes of popcorn. All were received very enthusiastically,. The calendar has been banned from being opened until 1st December, but, there are only two boxes left. They have been demolished with glee
settings.name: Elizabeth C.

settings.title: Great popcorn, wonderful flavours
settings.testimonial: hank you for your lovely popcorn, I've never had cheese popcorn before and it was amazing, will definitely try it again, the small bags were just the right size to eat in one sitting, no sharing! The range of flavours was great and we are hooked, will definitely be ordering again and again.
settings.name: Josephine T.

settings.title: Amazing flavours
settings.testimonial: I haven't found any of the Popcorn Shed flavours I don't like, they're all so nice and this is a great way to sample some of them. Good sized bags that hold more than expected and very nicely presented too.
settings.name: Ruth

settings.title: Excellent taste and presentation
settings.testimonial: Excellent product bought as a gift - beautifully presented and delicious!
settings.name: Julie P.

settings.title:
Award winning
gourmet popcorn
settings.pretext:
For those sharing moments that matter.
We’re making gourmet popcorn the way it should be: by hand, using the highest quality ingredients, carefully sourced, lovingly crafted and free of any nasty preservatives or additives.

settings.title: What is Popcorn Shed?
settings.subtitle: Hi there! We’re Popcorn Shed and we’re on a mission to create the tastiest gourmet popcorn for those sharing moments that matter. We’re a family owned business based in the UK. Read more about our story here

settings.title: Do you have a shop?
settings.subtitle: We do not have a bricks and mortar shop at the moment. Our only shop is online.

settings.title: Are your products suitable for vegetarians?
settings.subtitle:
The majority of our products are vegetarian.  Please see here for all our products that are suitable for those with a vegetarian diet.

All Popcorn Shed products are made in an environment that handles nuts, peanuts, dairy, gluten and soya.  Whilst a full clean down takes place between production runs, we cannot guarantee that they are free from traces of these ingredients.

settings.title: Are your products vegan?
settings.subtitle:
Our Mini Pop! Range is fully vegan. Please see link here for all our products that are suitable for those with a vegan diet. 

All Popcorn Shed products are made in an environment that handles nuts, peanuts, dairy, gluten and soya.  Whilst a full clean down takes place between production runs, we cannot guarantee that they are free from traces of these ingredients.

settings.title: Allergy advice for your popcorn?
settings.subtitle:
Product listings include an allergen tab.  Please check this for further information on individual flavours.  If there is no allergen tab, please check the single flavour product listings.

All Popcorn Shed products are made in an environment that handles nuts, peanuts, dairy, gluten and soya.  Whilst a full clean down takes place between production runs, we cannot guarantee that they are free from traces of these ingredients.

settings.title: Are your products gluten free?
settings.subtitle:
All flavours do not contain Gluten with the exception of Cookies & Cream and Birthday Cake popcorn. 

All Popcorn Shed products are made in an environment that handles nuts, peanuts, dairy, gluten and soya.  Whilst a full clean down takes place between production runs, we cannot guarantee that they are free from traces of these ingredients.

settings.title: Are your products dairy free?
settings.subtitle:
Our Mini Pop! Range is dairy free. Please see below link here for all our products that are suitable for those with a dairy free diet.

All Popcorn Shed products are made in an environment that handles nuts, peanuts, dairy, gluten and soya.  Whilst a full clean down takes place between production runs, we cannot guarantee that they are free from traces of these ingredients.

settings.title: Are your products all natural?
settings.subtitle: Wherever possible we use natural ingredients.

settings.title: Are your products healthy?
settings.subtitle: We have popcorn options that are both indulgent and low calorie.

settings.title: How long is your shelf life?
settings.subtitle: Our products are delivered with a minimum of 4 months shelf life.  In most cases this will be far longer, up to 12 months.

settings.title: How do I keep my popcorn fresh?
settings.subtitle: Popcorn is susceptible to the moisture in the air.  In order to keep your popcorn fresh, store in a cool dry place and once opened, reseal the bag to ensure freshness.

settings.title: Where is my parcel?
settings.subtitle:
Royal Mail advise that 95% of the parcels on this service arrive between 2-3 days with the remaining parcels being delivered on the next working day.

​

Please note that courier deliveries to Northern Ireland, Channel Isles, Isle of Man, Scilly Isles, Scottish Islands and Scottish Highlands can take between four and five days.

​

Unfortunately we’re not able to take responsibility for any delays on the part of Royal Mail. But if there are any problems, we’ll do our best to let you know as soon as we can. All deliveries are trackable and you will be provided with a tracking code.

​

If your parcel has still not arrived, please email us at hello@popcornshed.com and we will raise an investigation with the delivery service to try and locate your order, and resolve this with you as soon as possible.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.subtitle:
We ship all UK orders using Royal Mail 48 tracked delivery service.  Shipping will take place on the same day for orders placed before 1pm; otherwise dispatch will take place on the next working day.  Royal Mail 48 typically takes 2 working days from dispatch to delivery.

NOVEMBER 2020 UPDATE: Due to high demand, some orders are subject to a slight delay and we can not fully guarantee delivery dates. We are working around the clock to fix this.

settings.title: What time will delivery take place?
settings.subtitle: Parcels from Royal Mail may arrive Monday to Saturday, any time between 8am and 4pm.

settings.title: Do you ship to the United States of America?
settings.subtitle: Yes we do. We offer international shipping on the majority of our products.

settings.title: Do you ship to Europe?
settings.subtitle:
We currently ship parcels weighing up to 2kg to the following countries:

Aland Islands, Albania, Andorra, Armenia, Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Bosnia And Herzegovina, Bouvet Island, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Faroe Islands, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Gibraltar, Greece, Greenland, Guadeloupe, Guernsey, Holy See (Vatican City State), Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Isle Of Man, Italy, Jersey, Kosovo, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, North Macedonia, Malta, Moldova, Republic of, Monaco, Montenegro, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Reunion, Romania, San Marino, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine.

Shipping to Europe typically takes 7-10 working days but can be quicker, depending on the country.

settings.title: Do you ship to the Channel Isles,  Scottish Islands, Scottish Highlands, Isle of Man and Scilly Isles?
settings.subtitle: Yes we do. Shipping time is estimated between four and five days.

settings.title: Can my order be delivered the next day?
settings.subtitle: Unfortunately we do not provide next day delivery for web orders at present.

settings.title: What are your new safety procedures for contactless delivery?
settings.subtitle: Everything is prepared and packaged with all team members wearing the correct protective equipment. The delivery is then made directly to your door, without any customer contact.

settings.title: How can I cancel or change my order?
settings.subtitle:
We will endeavour to accommodate any requests to order changes however in the vast majority of cases orders are processed instantly after checkout therefore we regret that most order changes will be unable to be accommodated.  

We advise customers to ensure they enter the correct delivery and contact information at checkout.

settings.title: Can I place a wholesale order?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we service wholesale accounts.  Our minimum order for wholesale is £100 + VAT.

settings.title: How do I start a wholesale account?
settings.subtitle:
Please register your interest here and someone in our wholesale sales team will contact you.

https://popcorn-shed.gogecko.com/

settings.title: What type of payments do you accept?
settings.subtitle: We accept payment by Paypal or credit/debit card using our preferred secure payments provider, Stripe.

settings.title: What happens to my debit/credit card information?
settings.subtitle: Credit/debit card payments are managed by a third party payment provider, Stripe.  Your credit/debit card information will not be retained unless you expressly consent to do so by opting in to ‘Shop Pay’ on the checkout payment page.  Shop Pay’s privacy policy and terms of service are available to view from the checkout payments page.

settings.title: Will I receive an order confirmation email?
settings.subtitle: You will receive an email confirmation once you have placed your order.

settings.title: Will a receipt be included in the parcel?
settings.subtitle: Your parcel will be receipt free. You will receive a receipt via email.

settings.title: Will I receive a packing slip in the parcel?
settings.subtitle: Yes, you will receive a packing slip inside the parcel, detailing the items ordered and the quantity of each item.

settings.title: Will the price paid appear on the packing slip?
settings.subtitle: No, the price paid will not appear on the packing slip.

settings.title: Where will the gift note appear?
settings.subtitle: The gift note will appear on the packing slip.

settings.title: What are your latest offers?
settings.subtitle: To stay up-to-date with all Popcorn Shed news and to be the first to hear about new offers and exclusive discount codes, please subscribe to our mailing list or follow us on social media!

settings.title: I have a discount code. Where do I apply this to my order?
settings.subtitle: On the checkout page where you populate the shipping address there is a field called ‘ Gift card or discount code’ populate your discount code here and select ‘apply’.

settings.title: Can I use two discount codes at the same time?
settings.subtitle: No, you can not. We can only accept one discount code per order.

settings.title: Are discount codes valid for all products in the shop?
settings.subtitle: Discount codes are not valid for Sale items and for Bundle Builder products, as these are already discounted automatically.

settings.title: Do you offer discounts for big orders?
settings.subtitle: For orders over £150, please contact us at hello@popcornshed.com

settings.title: I’m not happy with my popcorn
settings.subtitle:
We’re sorry that you are not satisfied with your Popcorn Shed popcorn. Please get in touch with our customer service team and we will get back to you as soon as possible to resolve this for you. Email hello@popcornshed.com providing us with the following information:

Order Number, Where it was purchased, Best Before Date and Batch Code, Proof of purchase, Any images (if possible)

settings.title: My order is damaged, incomplete or is not what I ordered. What should I do?
settings.subtitle: We’re so sorry that your item has not arrived as it should have done. Please contact our customer service team at hello@popcornshed.com with your order number and details of the issue and any images if possible and we will get back to you as soon as possible to resolve this.

settings.title: I have a flavour idea! Who do I tell?
settings.subtitle: We love hearing from our customers! Send us your ideas to fansof@popcornshed.com.

settings.title: What are Popcorn Points?
settings.subtitle: Popcorn Points is our rewards scheme.  You can earn Popcorn Points every time you shop, ready to spend on lovely gifts for your friends and family.  Click here for more details.

settings.title: Where can I find my points?
settings.subtitle: Your points will be in the Rewards app once you log into your account via the account page at https://popcornshed.com/account

settings.title: How do I know how many points I’ll earn?
settings.subtitle: You’ll earn 10 points for every £1 you spend with us. 100 points has the retail value equivalent of £1.  For example if you spend £25 we’ll give you 250 Popcorn Points to spend on your next shop. The value of these points is £2.50.  Please note shipping costs are excluded from the total and we calculate Popcorn Points based upon the total spent on the products you order.

settings.title: Where can I spend my points?
settings.subtitle: Your points can be spent on any online orders at popcornshed.com. Log into your account and they’ll appear at the checkout on the payment page.

settings.title:
Award winning
gourmet popcorn
settings.pretext:
For those sharing moments that matter.
We’re making gourmet popcorn the way it should be: by hand, using the highest quality ingredients, carefully sourced, lovingly crafted and free of any nasty preservatives or additives.

settings.title: Bring your brand or campaign to life with our branded popcorn offering.
settings.text:
Ready-to-eat popcorn has quickly become one of the fastest growing snacks on the market today. Popcorn’s versatility lends itself to a multitude of different flavouring options. Looking for sweet or savoury popcorn or a novelty flavour? We're here to help!

We use all natural, high quality ingredients in our products, and source our ingredients locally wherever possible. We pride ourselves on great tasting, top quality popcorn. We can help with small and large batch requirements, across a multitude of flavours and pack formats including bags, boxes, tubs, tins, buckets and containers. We offer:

• Sweet Popcorn (Caramel, Chocolate, Toffee, Butterscotch)

• Savoury Popcorn (Cheese, Chilli, Salted)

• Sweet & Savoury Popcorn (Sweet and Salty)

• Different Preparations (Air Popped, Oil Popped)

Looking for something unique and beautifully branded to fit your needs and wishes? A specific flavour or a bespoke packaging requirement? We're here to help!

settings.title: Specific dietary needs?
settings.text:
Do you have a specific popcorn product in mind? If you’re looking for popcorn to suit specific dietary requirements, we can also help!

We offer:

• Gluten Free Popcorn

• Vegetarian Popcorn

• Protein Popcorn

• Vegan Popcorn

• Dairy Free Popcorn

• Low Calorie Popcorn

All of our popcorn is made to order from state of the art manufacturing facilities in the United Kingdom. The factories are SALSA accredited and operate to the highest standards of safety and hygiene.

settings.title: Our Flavours
settings.text: We have over 10 delicious flavours to choose from. And there is one to suit every palate! We also offer bespoke flavour development options if you’re looking for something a little bit different.
